name: Granny Curdle's Jam Factory
description:
Welcome to Granny Curdle's Jam Factory! 

Granny Curdle is getting old, and winding down from her career, and is no longer able to carry on her award winning and multi-million dollar jam factory. You, as young Curdle, must carry on the legacy of your Grandmother and try your best to maintain the factory and complete every order as fast as you can! But beware, the jam season is winding down, so the final rush of orders are going to start coming in!

Unfortunately for you, the factory power generator has just blown before your first day on the job. Last minute, the engineers replaced the jam machines with wind up crank generators that power the machines. You must not only make sure the machines start once loading them, but you also must make calls for fruit, load the fruit through vacuum pipes, and fulfill your deliveries.

Note: The web build isn't perfectly optimized and can become more laggy over time of playing it. If you have a Windows computer, downloading the .exe is preferred :D

Important Controls:

(Gamepad recommended)

P / Esc - Pause Game

Backspace - Exit or Cancel Menu

* Other Controls Prompted in Game *
